The technologies themselves, as suggested in the quote above, also proved a source of contention. A Muslim woman explained:
Other people discouraged us a lot. They said a lot of negative things and said things like our land won’t grow any crops because we didn’t plough it and we should just break the land and cultivate it again but we didn’t listen to them. We were quiet and carried on with our decision of continuing to practice this method. (Interview with a participant)
